longDescription:
• Monitor systems to detect and respond to security threats.
  • Perform vulnerability assessments and recommend improvements.
  • Assist in setting up firewalls and security configurations.
  • Support the team in investigating security incidents and breaches.
outcomeDescription:
Upon completing the apprenticeship, you could progress into roles such as:

  • Cyber Security Analyst
  • Security Operations Center (SOC) Specialist
  • Penetration Tester
  • Cyber Security Consultant

 

With further experience, leadership roles like Cyber Security Manager are attainable.
trainingDescription:
• Training will include a mix of on-the-job learning at your office and formal instruction with a certified training provider.
  • Classroom or virtual sessions will occur weekly, with occasional travel to a training center if required.
thingsToConsider:
This role may require extended screen time and working outside regular hours during security incidents.
A strong interest in problem-solving and staying updated on emerging threats is essential.
wageAdditionalInformation:
Apprentices start on a competitive wage, with planned increases based on performance and certification milestones.
All training costs, including exam fees, are covered by the employer.
category: Chartered legal executive litigator and advocate
description: Launch your career in cyber security with this apprenticeship! Gain hands-on experience, industry certifications, and training from top professionals while protecting systems and data. Join a growing field with excellent career opportunities.
subCategory: Chartered legal executive litigator and advocate
subCategoryCode: Chartered legal executive litigator and advocate
title: Cyber Security Analyst Apprenticeship
employerDescription: We are a leading technology and security solutions provider, dedicated to protecting businesses and individuals from cyber threats. With a commitment to innovation and professional development, we offer a supportive environment where apprentices can grow and thrive.
standardTitle: Chartered legal executive litigator and advocate
companyBenefitsInformation:
Flexible working options, including remote work.
Access to cutting-edge technology and software.
Private healthcare and wellness programs.
Opportunities for career progression and continued professional development.
additionalTrainingDescription:
• Delivered by an accredited provider specializing in cyber security certifications.
  • Training is structured with a blend of lectures, hands-on labs, and assessments to reinforce learning.
  • Mentors will guide your practical application of skills in real-world projects.
